attributes.action: Recognise the efforts and achievements of Tom Stoltman.
attributes.additional_details:
Over the last 5 years Tom Stoltman has become a dominant competitor in strength sport collecting world records and the world strongest man title. 

As well as this Tom has served as an inspiration to other young people with autism, become a humble and open man and true credit to Britain and Scotland.

In an age of increasing focus on physical and mental health Tom has become a true role model while also becoming the worlds best strength athlete, all by the age of 27
attributes.background: Tom Stoltmans dedication and achievements in strength sport, mental health outreach and work as a role model to young people with autism should be officially recognised my the Government.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, as there is a separate process for that. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: https://www.gov.uk/honours.
